title: Gangplank's new passive, on hit or next attack?
body:
Gangplank's new passive. Is it treated as an on hit effect, or is it a next attack effect.


Pretty much want to know if Sated Devourer would proc the burn twice.

replies.body: If it is an on hit effect his Q parley should proc it
His Q is an exception it says in the tooltip (parrrley will not proc trial by fire)
It's an on attack effect, so it won't proc twice from Sated Devourer.
